title: Sanchi Stupa
long: Sanchi Stupa is one of the oldest stone structures in India and an important monument of Buddhist architecture...
history: Built in the 3rd century BCE by Emperor Ashoka...
transportation: Reachable via Bhopal by road or rail. Local taxis available.
culture: Important site for Buddhist rituals and festivals.

faq.question: Is entry free?
faq.answer: Yes, minimal charges for the museum area.

summary: A UNESCO World Heritage site with ancient Buddhist stupas and carvings.

title: Baijnath Mahadev Temple
long: Sanchi Stupa is one of the oldest stone structures in India and an important monument of Buddhist architecture...
history: Construction began in 1528 and was completed in 1536. The peak/spire of the temple is about 50 feet high from ground level. The peak/spire of the temple is about 50 feet high from ground level.
transportation: Reachable via Bhopal by road or rail. Local taxis available.
culture: Important site for Buddhist rituals and festivals.
